LanguageData.WNA_FactionWNA.label: Whellingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_FactionWNA.description: Thousands of years ago they rose from a remote planet where people suffers from conflicts and oppression, since then they have spread their activities across the known universe, mysterious as ghosts and omnipresent as shades. These black-hooded figure and the Whelingnorther Humanoid Revolt under their command have brought death and horror to almost everywhere they reached. This cult itself is relatively young but actually their origin is far more ancient, even older than the universe. This branch of Whelingnorther Alliance have settled on this rimworld for a long time. Although they appear to be peaceful at the moment, they have undoubtedly had plenty of violent conflicts with other factions on the planet. Recently they seem to be becoming active again and preparing to achieve their ultimate goal - the Whelingnorther Apocalypse. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_FactionWNA.ideoDescription: When the ancient whelingnorthans faced calamity and annihilation, it was their effort and sacrifice that led to the greatness and glory of Whelingnorther Empire; when the ancestors of us rise from the humble, it was their effort and sacrifices that led to we Whelingnorther Alliance. No great works can be done without great sacrifices, without great devotions we cannot achieve eternity, salvation and immortality. We descendants will follow the path led by those who came before us; we will understand our duty and accept our manifest destiny; we shall alter and determine the past, the present and the future. Every corner of existance shall bath in the glory of Whelignorther, they may not understand, but they shall obey and follow.
